description.name: Low Profile Dual Pump Floor Jack 3T 75-500 mm GEKO Premium
description.long_desc:
Robust and stable Hydraulic Trolley Jack 3T. Dual pump for quick lift.


Product Features



  • 3 tonne lifting capacity

  • Huge 500 mm lifting height

  • Dual pump for quick lift

  • Twist grip handle release mechanism for controlled lowering

  • Two swivel castors to enable easy positioning

  • Two large steel wheels for better stability


Technical Data



  • Loading Capacity: 3 tonne

  • Minimum Height: 75 mm

  • Maximum Height: 500 mm

  • Weight: approx. 32 kg


Package Contents:



  • 1x Hydraulic trolley

  • 1x Handle 110 cm

  • 1x Rubber pad for saddle

description.name: Dust collector
description.long_desc:
Urzdzenie do odprowadzania wir i trocin podczas obrbki drewna.

Cechy produktu

  • Pojemno worka na wiry 65 l
  • Szybkie mocowanie workw za pomoc metalowej opaski
  • Gumowe kka oraz uchwyt pozwalaj na szybkie przemieszczanie urzdzenia
  • Worek pocienny filtracyjny
  • Worek foliowy odpadowy

Dane techniczne

  • Napicie: 230V
  • Moc: 550W
  • Obroty wirnika: 2840 obr./min
  • Przepyw powietrza: 1150 m3/h
  • Krciec odcigowy: fi 100 mm
  • Dugo wa: 170 cm

description.name: Cordless Hammer Drill 14.4V Double Speed with Case & Bits
description.long_desc:
GEKO Hammer Drill 14.4V 1,3Ah. Double-gearbox with 0 - 1300 rpm. Can be used in forward or reverse modes at the flick of a switch.


Product Features



  • Power Control - through 20 + 1 torque settings

  • 2-speed gearbox: 1st: 0-300 rpm, 2nd: 0-1300 rpm

  • Keyless chuck 10 mm

  • LED working light

  • Lithium battery technology: Li-Ion 14.4V 1.3Ah battery

  • Battery charge indicator on battery

  • Comfortable softgrip

  • Set of Drills & Bits, battery and charger included.


Technical Data



  • Battery Voltage: 14.4V

  • Power Source: Li-Ion battery 1.3 Ah

  • Revolutions Per Minute: 0-1300

  • Charger Included: Yes

  • Battery Included: Yes
